name: Convergence Day
description: The temporal anomaly crisis has caused chaos, but also scientific breakthroughs, family reunions, second chances--plenty to celebrate. Help Quark get Convergence Day off the ground!
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of the Quark, Picard, or Q will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Quark, Picard, or Q
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Ogawa
featured_crew.flavor: During the Borg attack, Ogawa helped evacuate casualties from the Enterprise-E infirmary.

featured_crew.name: Q
featured_crew.flavor: After being stripped of his powers by the Q Continuum, Q sought refuge on the Enterprise-D.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Picard
rewards.flavor: Captain of the legendary U.S.S. Enterprise-D, Captain Picard was key to many of the Federation's successes.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Ogawa
rewards.flavor: During the Borg attack, Ogawa helped evacuate casualties from the Enterprise-E infirmary.

rewards.name: Picard
rewards.flavor: Picard assumed the role of the smuggler Galen after being captured by raiders searching for a Vulcan psionic weapon.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Ogawa
rewards.flavor: During the Borg attack, Ogawa helped evacuate casualties from the Enterprise-E infirmary.

adventures.name: To Each His Own
adventures.description: Make Convergence Day culturally appropriate on all worlds.

adventures.description: Conceive new drinks and snacks for the holiday.

adventures.description: Promote acceptance and enthusiasm for the new holiday.

adventures.description: Ensure the biggest names in the Federation are there.

screens.text: "You humans used to have holidays for children being born, countries being founded, the end of a war. On many worlds, they call that Tuesday."

"Every day I read about some new scientific discovery they've made as a result of these anomalies. Worf's got his wife back... and the mother of his child. Khan Noonien Singh gets another shot at ruling the galaxy, and any day now I'm expecting the Blessed Exchequer to appear."

"Call me sentimental, but I think there's something actually worth celebrating there, and your Federation agrees. We're calling it Convergence Day. So go ahead, loosen your collar and celebrate! Try the Convergence Colada, while you're at it."
"You humans used to have holidays for children being born, countries being founded, the end of a war. On many worlds, they call that Tuesday."

"Every day I read about some new scientific discovery they've made as a result of these anomalies. Worf's got his wife back... and the mother of his child. Khan Noonien Singh gets another shot at ruling the galaxy, and any day now I'm expecting the Blessed Exchequer to appear."

"Call me sentimental, but I think there's something actually worth celebrating there, and your Federation agrees. We're calling it Convergence Day. So go ahead, loosen your collar and celebrate! Try the Convergence Colada, while you're at it."
"You humans used to have holidays for children being born, countries being founded, the end of a war. On many worlds, they call that Tuesday."

"Every day I read about some new scientific discovery they've made as a result of these anomalies. Worf's got his wife back... and the mother of his child. Khan Noonien Singh gets another shot at ruling the galaxy, and any day now I'm expecting the Blessed Exchequer to appear."

"Call me sentimental, but I think there's something actually worth celebrating there, and your Federation agrees. We're calling it Convergence Day. So go ahead, loosen your collar and celebrate! Try the Convergence Colada, while you're at it."
"You humans used to have holidays for children being born, countries being founded, the end of a war. On many worlds, they call that Tuesday."

"Every day I read about some new scientific discovery they've made as a result of these anomalies. Worf's got his wife back... and the mother of his child. Khan Noonien Singh gets another shot at ruling the galaxy, and any day now I'm expecting the Blessed Exchequer to appear."

"Call me sentimental, but I think there's something actually worth celebrating there, and your Federation agrees. We're calling it Convergence Day. So go ahead, loosen your collar and celebrate! Try the Convergence Colada, while you're at it."
